item.title: Has SRF Ltd. declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, SRF Ltd. has declared a dividend of 50%, amounting to ₹4 per share, with an ex-date of January 27, 2026. The total returns over various periods show significant growth, especially a 156.25% total return over the past 5 years. Time: 24 minutes ago

item.title: Has Persistent Systems Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Persistent Systems Ltd has declared a dividend of 440%, amounting to ₹15 per share, with an ex-date of January 27, 2026. The company has shown strong total returns over various periods, particularly in the long term. Time: 24 minutes ago
